de.schlegel11.lambdadecor

Interface LambdaDecor<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type for this behaviour
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultLambdaDecor

    public interface LambdaDecor<T>
    Class that holds a Behaviour type with a specific type T.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Marcel Schlegel (schlegel11)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T apply(T type)
      Applies this Behaviour to the given type T.
      void unapply()
      Performs the specific Unappliable operation of this Behaviour.
      LambdaDecor<T> updateBehaviour(Function<Behaviour<T>,Behaviour<T>> behaviour)
      Updates the held Behaviour.

    • Method Detail

      • updateBehaviour

        LambdaDecor<T> updateBehaviour(Function<Behaviour<T>,Behaviour<T>> behaviour)
        Updates the held Behaviour.
        Parameters:
        behaviour - Function that provides the currently hold Behaviour and returns the updated Behaviour
        Returns:
        this LambdaDecor object
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the behaviour is null or the return value if the Function is null

      • apply

        T apply(T type)
        Applies this Behaviour to the given type T. The resulting Unappliable is hold by this LambdaDecor.
        Parameters:
        type - specific type T
        Returns:
        type T object after applying all Behaviours

      • unapply

        void unapply()
        Performs the specific Unappliable operation of this Behaviour. After that operation the Unappliable should be empty.
